读取P(0x0046)Q(0x0047)S(0x0048)的数据
TX: 01 03 00 46 00 03 E6 8E
RX: 0x01 #address
0x03 #function
0x06 #number of bytes
0x00 0x00 # data of register one queried
0x00 0x00 # data of register two queried
0x00 0x00 # data of register three queried
0x21 0x75 #crc check

01 03 06 27 10 27 10 27 10 3A EC

单台设备检测广播:
TX: 00 03 00 00 00 08 45 DD
RX: 06 03 10 DB 03 00 FA 00 32 06 06 00 01 00 01 32 00 FF 15 CC FC
多台设备检测: 从01至247号依次搜索

读取正向有功总电能
TX: 01 03 00 0C 00 02 04 08
RX: 0x03 0x04 0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 0xFA 0x33

读取6路寄存器的数值
TX: 
01 #电表地址
03 #功能码, 读取
00 0C #正向有功总电能高位, 寄存器的开始地址
00 0C #读6路寄存器, 每路寄存器2个字节, 一共12字节
85 CC #crc校验码, 低位在前

RX:
0x01 
0x03 
0x18 
0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 
0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 
0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 
0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 
0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 
0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 
0x6C 0xF4

改写表号:
TX: 01 10 00 03 00 04 08 02 06 00 01 00 01 32 00 2C C7
RX: 02 10 00 03 00 04 31 F9
TX: 02 10 00 03 00 04 08 06 06 00 01 00 01 32 00 6E 35
RX: 06 10 00 03 00 04 30 7D
TX: 06 10 00 03 00 04 08 01 06 00 01 00 01 32 00 2B D0
RX: 01 10 00 03 00 04 31 CA

读取表数据:
TX: 06 03 00 40 00 18 45 A3
RX: 06 03 30 23 AF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 13 83 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 07 85 46 71

TX: 01 03 00 40 00 18 44 14
RX: 01 03 30 24 47 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 13 83 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 07 78 08 10
